title: Directional signs and tactile guiding path should readily identify and provide a logical sequence from a starting point to a point of destination and a clear indication of return routes to the named exits
clause_text: Directional signs and tactile guiding path should readily identify and provide a logical sequence from a starting point to a point of destination and a clear indication of return routes to the named exits. Clear indication of the existence of steps or ramps on a route should be provided at both ends of the route
